scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run -s og-image && npm run -s deck
scripts.deck: marp --no-stdin slides/TerosHDL_guides.md -o dist/index.html && npm run -s windows && npm run -s linux && ncp assets dist/assets
scripts.windows: marp --no-stdin slides/windows.md -o dist/windows.html && marp --no-stdin slides/windows.md -o dist/windows.pdf
scripts.linux: marp --no-stdin slides/linux.md -o dist/linux.html && marp --no-stdin slides/linux.md -o dist/linux.pdf
